title: Zed changes
body: Hey riot, you may want to reword your patch notes, the change makes it sound like you guys are making his Q fall off damage decrease, when it's actually the multiple shuriken damage that isn't falling off as much.

replies.body: It's really a buff and not a nerf.

It's a buff if your enemy is bad/you are good with skillshots.

If someone is getting hit by multiple Shurikens it's really their own problem.

Actually it's pretty easy to land both Shurikens which is actually where most of Zed's damage comes from especially given how quickly and how far you can throw your shurikens. I personally angle my shadow to make it harder for my enemy to dodge both and I generally land both fairly often especially in my ult combo. 

Yes it's a nerf if you only throw 1 shuriken but as Zed I simply don't throw 1 so it's a buff. If I really want to kill them I'll throw 3 and at least 2 would generally land.

It's the exchange thing effect?

Lower the dmg, but up the % of damage per Q hit on target
(Just so you know Mindstar has brought it up with someone and the wording has been changed, the wording used to be more ambiguous.)
